page.title: 06Westcliff Estate.
page.content: Westcliff Community Centre was opened in 1982.It provides lots of activities for the area... Bingo, Judo, Karate, discos on Friday and Saturday nights, Darts, Dominoes, Whist drives, special suppers and Playschool. Dorchester Lodge is an old people's home. It has six flats on each corridor. On one corridor is the warden's flat. Next to the warden's flat there's an office with the records of who lives there. Altogether there are three floors. There are two corridors on each floor. On each floor there is a fire escape so that if there's a fire you can escape quickly and safely. Altogether there are 32 flats. In the common room on the ground floor all sorts happens, like Bingo, card games, Dominoes, Darts, coffee mornings and sing-a-longs.
